page.title: 06A Local Councillor
page.content: Mr Doig is not only a milkman but he has been a councillor for nine years too.He likes to be a councillor because he likes to have a say in what's going on and he feels that he is giving something back to the community because it is where he earns his living.The main problems he feels are vandalism and litter.Some people are never pleased with what he does for them and always want more.He feels that money doesn't always help when some people want one thing and other people might not want it at all.His interests are leisure and recreation and town planning.Mr Doig is an independent councillor so he can do what he thinks is best and doesn't have to listen to anyone else.
